Package javazoom.jlgui.player.amp.skin

Class Summary
AbsoluteConstraints An object that encapsulates position and (optionally) size for Absolute positioning of components.
AbsoluteLayout AbsoluteLayout is a LayoutManager that works as a replacement for "null" layout to allow placement of components in absolute positions.

Skin This class allows to load all skin (2.0 compliant) features.
SkinLoader This class implements a Skin Loader.
Taftb Taftb is used to build gif image from graphical fonts.
UrlDialog UrlDialog class implements a DialogBox to get an URL.
